name: Rapid Balls
description:
Challenge yourself in this new super addictive and creative game! Completely free, try to reach the highest score while the speed increases, will you be fast enough?

The rules are simple:
• Swipe the red balls away
• Collect the blue balls
• Reach the HIGHEST score you can!
• No time limit

How far can you go? Get Rapid Balls now, and find out your limits in the most downloaded game of the month!
